rooms.description: Spacious entrance with bohemian decor and natural lighting; foyer leads to living spaces.
Open-plan living room with rustic elements, exposed brickwork and large windows facing east for Vastu compliance. Ideal seating area for gatherings.
Modern kitchen integrated with traditional design; includes ample storage and a breakfast nook.
Cozy dining area that flows into the living room. Features rustic wooden tables with artisanal decor.
Dedicated fitness space with modern equipment; designed with natural ventilation and ample light from south-facing windows.
Secluded home theater room located on the east side for optimal acoustics and lighting; integrates modern soundproofing with bohemian elements.
Well-designed bathroom with traditional touches; includes ensuite for the master bedroom (see upstairs level) to maintain privacy and balance.

openings.description: Main entry door with an inviting arched design, complementing the bohemian aesthetic.
Large windows in the living room to allow natural light and maintain Vastu balance.
Open transition space allowing fluid movement between rooms, enhancing the farmhouse's rustic charm.
Secondary exit door from ground floor leading directly to the garden.
